org.hibernate.criterion

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.criterion.Restrictions
      • org.hibernate.criterion.Expression
  • Deprecated. 
    Use Restrictions instead

    @Deprecated
public final class Expression
extends Restrictions
    Factory for Criterion objects. Deprecated!
    See Also:
    Restrictions

      • sql

        @Deprecated
public static Criterion sql(String sql,
                       Object[] values,
                       Type[] types)
        Deprecated. use Restrictions.sqlRestriction(String, Object[], Type[])
        Apply a constraint expressed in SQL, with JDBC parameters. Any occurrences of {alias} will be replaced by the table alias.
        Parameters:
        sql - The sql
        values - The parameter values
        types - The parameter types
        Returns:
        Criterion

      • sql

        @Deprecated
public static Criterion sql(String sql)
        Deprecated. use Restrictions.sqlRestriction(String)
        Apply a constraint expressed in SQL with no parameters. Any occurrences of {alias} will be replaced by the table alias.
        Parameters:
        sql - The sql
        Returns:
        Criterion
